ERC20 tokens (deducting a 1% fee) and withdrawals are subject to configurable rules.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addNFTGate(address,uint8)":{"params":{"_nftAddress":"The NFT contract address.","_nftType":"The NFT type."}},"constructor":{"params":{"_accessType":"Access mode: Whitelist or NFTGated.","_defaultFeeCollector":"The fee collector address.","_emergencyWithdrawalEnabled":"If true, emergency withdrawal is enabled.","_fixedAmount":"Fixed withdrawal amount (if _withdrawalOption is Fixed).","_jarOwner":"The admin address.","_maxWithdrawal":"Maximum allowed withdrawal (if _withdrawalOption is Variable).","_nftAddresses":"Array of NFT contract addresses (only used if _accessType is NFTGated).","_nftTypes":"Array of NFT types corresponding to _nftAddresses.","_strictPurpose":"If true, the withdrawal purpose must be at least 20 characters.","_withdrawalInterval":"Time interval between withdrawals.","_withdrawalOption":"Withdrawal type: Fixed or Variable."}},"depositCurrency(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to deposit."}},"emergencyWithdrawWithoutState(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount to withdraw.","token":"If zero address then ETH is withdrawn; otherwise, ERC20 token address."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantJarBlacklistRole(address[])":{"params":{"_users":"The address of the user."}},"grantJarWhitelistRole(address[])":{"params":{"_users":"The address of the user."}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"removeNFTGate(address)":{"params":{"_nftAddress":"The NFT contract address."}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferJarOwnership(address)":{"params":{"_newAdmin":"The new admin address."}},"updateFeeCollector(address)":{"params":{"_newFeeCollector":"The new fee collector address."}},"withdrawNFTMode(uint256,string,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount to withdraw.","gateAddress":"The NFT contract address used for gating.","purpose":"A description for the withdrawal.","tokenId":"The NFT token id used for gating."}},"withdrawWhitelistMode(uint256,string)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount to withdraw.","purpose":"A description for the withdrawal."}}},"title":"CookieJar","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"AdminUpdated(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when admin rights are transferred."},"BlacklistUpdated(address[],bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when a blacklist entry is updated."},"Deposit(address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a deposit is made."},"EmergencyWithdrawal(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an emergency withdrawal is executed."},"FeeCollectorUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the fee collector address is updated."},"NFTGateAdded(address,uint8)":{"notice":"Emitted when an NFT gate is added."},"NFTGateRemoved(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when an NFT gate is removed."},"WhitelistUpdated(address[],bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when a whitelist entry is updated."},"Withdrawal(address,uint256,string,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a withdrawal occurs."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"accessType()":{"notice":"The admin of the contract.Access control mode: Whitelist or NFTGated."},"addNFTGate(address,uint8)":{"notice":"Adds a new NFT gate if it is not already registered."},"constructor":{"notice":"Initializes a new CookieJar contract."},"depositCurrency(uint256)":{"notice":"Deposits Currency tokens into the contract; 1% fee is forwarded to the fee collector."},"depositETH()":{"notice":"Deposits ETH into the contract, deducting depositFee.Only works if the currency is ETH, which is address(3)."},"emergencyWithdrawWithoutState(address,uint256)":{"notice":"SECURITY CONCERN, UPDATE STATE OR NOT?Allows the admin to perform an emergency withdrawal of funds (ETH or ERC20)."},"emergencyWithdrawalEnabled()":{"notice":"If true, emergency withdrawal is enabled."},"feeCollector()":{"notice":"Fee collector address; note that admin is not the fee collector."},"fixedAmount()":{"notice":"Array of approved NFT gates (used in NFTGated mode).Fixed withdrawal amount (used if withdrawalOption is Fixed)."},"grantJarBlacklistRole(address[])":{"notice":"Updates the blacklist status of a user."},"grantJarWhitelistRole(address[])":{"notice":"Updates the jar whitelist status of a user."},"isWithdrawnByUser(address)":{"notice":"Only in the case of one time withdrawals."},"lastWithdrawalNFT(bytes32)":{"notice":"Stores the last withdrawal timestamp for NFT-gated withdrawals using a composite key (nftAddress, tokenId)."},"lastWithdrawalWhitelist(address)":{"notice":"Stores the last withdrawal timestamp for each whitelisted address."},"maxWithdrawal()":{"notice":"Maximum withdrawal amount (used if withdrawalOption is Variable)."},"nftGates(uint256)":{"notice":"Array of approved NFT gates (used in NFTGated mode)."},"oneTimeWithdrawal()":{"notice":"If true, each recipient can only claim from the jar once."},"removeNFTGate(address)":{"notice":"Removes an NFT gate."},"strictPurpose()":{"notice":"If true, each withdrawal must have a purpose string of at least 20 characters."},"transferJarOwnership(address)":{"notice":"Transfers admin rights to a new address."},"updateFeeCollector(address)":{"notice":"Updates the fee collector address."},"withdrawNFTMode(uint256,string,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws funds (ETH or ERC20) for NFT-gated users."},"withdrawWhitelistMode(uint256,string)":{"notice":"Withdraws funds (ETH or ERC20) for whitelisted users."},"withdrawalInterval()":{"notice":"Time (in seconds) required between withdrawals."},"withdrawalOption()":{"notice":"Withdrawal option: Fixed or Variable."}},"notice":"A decentralized smart contract for controlled fund withdrawals. params._emergencyWithdrawalEnabled: If true, emergency withdrawal is enabled.
params._nftAddresses: Array of NFT contract addresses (only used if _accessType is NFTGated).
params._nftTypes: Array of NFT types corresponding to _nftAddresses.
params._strictPurpose: If true, the withdrawal purpose must be at least 20 characters.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit.

params.token: If zero address then ETH is withdrawn; otherwise, ERC20 token address.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.gateAddress: The NFT contract address used for gating.
params.tokenId: The NFT token id used for gating.

accessType().notice: The admin of the contract.Access control mode: Whitelist or NFTGated.

addNFTGate(address,uint8).notice: Adds a new NFT gate if it is not already registered.

depositCurrency(uint256).notice: Deposits Currency tokens into the contract; 1% fee is forwarded to the fee collector.

depositETH().notice: Deposits ETH into the contract, deducting depositFee.Only works if the currency is ETH, which is address(3).

emergencyWithdrawWithoutState(address,ui.notice: SECURITY CONCERN, UPDATE STATE OR NOT?Allows the admin to perform an emergency withdrawal of funds (ETH or ERC20).

emergencyWithdrawalEnabled().notice: If true, emergency withdrawal is enabled.

feeCollector().notice: Fee collector address; note that admin is not the fee collector.

fixedAmount().notice: Array of approved NFT gates (used in NFTGated mode).Fixed withdrawal amount (used if withdrawalOption is Fixed).

grantJarBlacklistRole(address[]).notice: Updates the blacklist status of a user.

grantJarWhitelistRole(address[]).notice: Updates the jar whitelist status of a user.

isWithdrawnByUser(address).notice: Only in the case of one time withdrawals.

lastWithdrawalNFT(bytes32).notice: Stores the last withdrawal timestamp for NFT-gated withdrawals using a composite key (nftAddress, tokenId).

lastWithdrawalWhitelist(address).notice: Stores the last withdrawal timestamp for each whitelisted address.

maxWithdrawal().notice: Maximum withdrawal amount (used if withdrawalOption is Variable).

nftGates(uint256).notice: Array of approved NFT gates (used in NFTGated mode).

oneTimeWithdrawal().notice: If true, each recipient can only claim from the jar once.

strictPurpose().notice: If true, each withdrawal must have a purpose string of at least 20 characters.

transferJarOwnership(address).notice: Transfers admin rights to a new address.

withdrawNFTMode(uint256,string,address,u.notice: Withdraws funds (ETH or ERC20) for NFT-gated users.

withdrawWhitelistMode(uint256,string).notice: Withdraws funds (ETH or ERC20) for whitelisted users.
